name: 蔡逸萍
objective:
本課程提供在各種場合中口譯的應用。如伴隨工廠參觀，出席展覽會場，開幕演說，及外賓接待，採取密集的口語演練，並訓練隨行解說的技巧。Course description:
The course refreshes students’ basic knowledge of interpretation, primarily short consecutive interpreting- the mode frequently used in escort interpreting. Students employ the skills and strategies of escort interpreting and apply them to a variety of formal and informal on-site visits in many areas. Students develop cultural sensitivity to address different groups of foreign visitors. While oral interpreting is the integral part of the course, students also enhance their general ability of the English language.
